explains: v. 归还，[计]返回，回复（return 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: returning officer n. 选举监察人

sentences.en: Was he a spectre returning to haunt her?
sentences.cn: 是不是他的幽灵回来找她了？

sentences.en: She is hopeful of returning to work soon.
Now they are returning to claim what was theirs.
sentences.cn: 现在他们回来索要原本属于他们的东西。
